config.invmove.title: InvMove Config
tooltip.config.invmove.movement.enable:
Enable movement while inside inventories.
You can manually turn off certain inventories below.
There is a keybind you can set to toggle this.
tooltip.config.invmove.movement.sneak:
How to handle sneaking while inside inventories:
Off = No sneaking
Maintain = Keep sneaking if you were when the inventory opened
Pressed = Sneak only while holding the sneak button
(Pressed can be distracting when shift-clicking)
(If using toggle sneak, Pressed allows toggling and both other modes maintain)
tooltip.config.invmove.movement.textFiel: Disable movement in inventories when a text field is focused.
tooltip.config.invmove.movement.unrecogn: Default state for new unrecognized UIs.
tooltip.config.invmove.background.enable:
Hides the background tint while inside inventories.
You can manually turn off certain inventories below.
tooltip.config.invmove.background.hideOn:
How to handle screens that pause the game:
Show = Always show background
ShowSP = Show background in singleplayer, otherwise allow hide
AllowHide = Allow background to be hidden
tooltip.config.invmove.background.unreco: Default state for new unrecognized UIs.
key.invmove.category.movement.keys.desc: Only keys marked "Allow" will be handled by the mod.
key.invmove.module.nooptions: This module doesn't have any options.
key.invmove.unrecognized.desc: Unrecognized GUIs show up here once they have been interacted with.
tooltip.gui.advancements: This menu is a pause screen so this option may be overridden.
tooltip.item.minecraft.book: This menu is a pause screen so this option may be overridden.
